department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 本課程目的在於介紹數據科學，教導學生如何從資料收集、管理、統整分析至最終的圖表呈現。課程除了基礎統計分析說明之外，亦會介紹多種機器學習演算法，並且帶領學生使用 R 與 Python 分析生醫資料。
goal.en: This course provides a general introduction of the essential elements of data science, including data collection and management, summarizing and visualizing data, utilizing basic ideas of statistical inference, and machine learning. Students will have hand-on practices using Python and R

outline.ch:
1.課程介紹
2.用R language繪圖I
3.用R language繪圖II
4.數據科學介紹
5.認識你的資料
6.資料前處理
7.頻繁資料探勘方法
8.進階頻繁資料探勘方法
9.期中報告
10.分類: 基本概念
11.分類: 結果評估
12.分類: 進階概念
13.分群: 基本概念
14.分群: 進階概念
15.集成學習
16.期末專題報告
outline.en:
1. Course Introduction
2. Data Visualization with R Language I
3. Data Visualization with R Language II
4. Introduction to Data Science
5. Understanding Your Data
6. Data Preprocessing
7. Frequent Data Mining Methods
8. Advanced Frequent Data Mining Methods
9. Midterm Report
10. Classification: Basic Concepts
11. Classification: Performance Evaluation
12. Classification: Advanced Concepts
13. Clustering: Basic Concepts
14. Clustering: Advanced Concepts
15. Ensemble Learning
16. Final Project Presentation

gradMethod.ch:
期中報告：50％ 
期末報告：50％

flexDiscription.ch: 安排學生分組討論，自主學習資料整理與分析技術，完成數據視覺化，並分別於期中和期末進行報告。
flexDiscription.en: Organize students into groups for discussion, where they independently learn data organization and analysis techniques, complete data visualization tasks, and present their findings in both midterm and final reports.
